cells.data: -- mapAccumL_Tree :: (acc -> x -> (acc, y)) -> acc -> Tree -> (acc, Tree)on mapAccumL_Tree(f, acc, tree)	script go		property mf : mReturn(f)'s |位|		on |位|(a, x)			set pair to f(a, root of x)			set tpl to mapAccumL(go, item 1 of pair, nest of x)			Tuple(item 1 of tpl, Node(item 2 of pair, item 2 of tpl))		end |位|	end script	|位|(acc, tree) of goend mapAccumL_Tree
